title: I am looking to indemnify the fonts used on Unculturedmag if anyone could plllleeeeeease plllleassse be so kind as to help me!!!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104350im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UCM_4302.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104350im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ARC_6159.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104350im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UM_4655.jpg)

Here is the link to the website, there are three different fonts….i know a bit of a task….so if anyone would take the time i would be SO SO grateful.

The fonts are for the words :  
UNCULTURED MAGAZINE/  
FASHION,FILM,MUSIC,DESIGN,ART AND PHOTOGRAPHY/  
ARCHIVE, RSS, CONTACT

[http://unculturedmag.tumblr.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104350/http:/unculturedmag.tumblr.com/ "http://unculturedmag.tumblr.com")

Font: 

 “Fashion, Film, …”: Arial. “Archive, RSS, …”: Courier New. “UnCultured …”: Linotype Didot Italic. 

Solved By: 

 [riccard0](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104350/http:/typophile.com/user/46071 "View user profile.")
author: laurawilliams18

comments.content:
“Fashion, Film, …”: Arial.  
“Archive, RSS, …”: Courier New.  
“UnCultured …”: Linotype Didot Italic.
And, if Fivos confirms, I must be right (slow, but right nonetheless ;-)
Oh guys thank you so so much! I wouldn't even know where to begin when it comes to fonts. You are so kind xx
